title: Paris+ Art Fair Opens: More Corporate, Less French
description: The slick new event by Art Basel drew more A-list international collectors than FIAC, France’s former flagship fair — though perhaps at the expense of Parisian charm.
dc:creator: Scott Reyburn
media:credit: Stephane De Sakutin/Agence France-Presse — Getty Images
media:description: Visitors taking in the new Paris+ art fair on Wednesday, ahead of its official opening the next day.
